positive_examples: This is an example of classification boundary.
The classification boundary demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed classification boundary in this context.
A typical case of classification boundary would involve these features.
The concept of classification boundary applies here.
The demarcation lines that separate different categories or classes within a conceptual framework.
negative_examples: This is an example of decision boundary, not classification boundary.
This represents concept boundary in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: DecisionBoundary, or other types of ConceptBoundary

definition: A decision surface that separates different classes in a classification model.
